description: This walk takes you along the beach from Alnmouth To Boulmer on the Northumberland coast. It's just under 3 miles, passing along the wide sandy beach with splendid coastal views throughout. You can start at the beachside car park at Alnmouth and then head north east to Marden Rocks and Seaton Point before passing Boulmer Haven to finish at Boulmer. You can continue your walking along the Northumberland Coast Path which runs through the area. Heading south will take you to Warkworth while continuing north will take you to Craster .
display_address: Beach Car Park, Marine Road, Alnmouth, Northumberland, North East, England, NE66 2RP, United Kingdom
